main event: Flashing red and green lights were reported falling from the sky into the ocean near Hilo, Hawaii.
interesting points: The lights were observed falling between a volcano and Pahala, approximately 35 miles south of Hilo.
The report states the time of the observation as 37/6302.
The report indicates that the sighting was shut reported, but does not provide any additional details about the sighting.
location: between Volcano and Pahala, approximately 35 miles south of Hilo, Hawaii
